title: Work to identify beneficiaries for basic income to women on: Finance Minister - The New Indian Express
content:
1. Work to identify beneficiaries for basic income to women on: Finance Minister  The New Indian Express
  2. TN Budget 2022: Will file report on actions taken over finance panel's recommendations, says finance min  India Today

description: Providing the assistance of Rs 1,000 to women heads is one of the poll promises of the DMK which stormed to power in 2021.
